message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CC, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the construction and analysis of polar codes, which are a type of error-correcting code used in information theory. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.IT (Information Theory). The paper also involves the efficient computation of the approximation methods, which suggests that it could belong to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) or cs.CC (Computational Complexity). The use of approximation methods and theoretical analysis could also place it in cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) or cs.LG (Machine Learning).
